title: International Economic Issues Workbook
text:
Course Objectives
This is a companion book I’ve written for my EC 380 International Trade course. EC 380 is an introductory course to international economics undergraduates. Ideally, by the end of the course we will have:
Activity based on https://economicsnetwork.ac.uk/showcase/sloman_game

title: 1  First Things First
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
